APPENDIX FY22 IMPACT REPORT
Governance
The way we conduct our business is as  
important as the products we sell. We 
maintain robust and transparent processes to govern Autodesk as well as our impact strategy. We build trust with our employees, customers, investors, communities, and other stakeholders by acting with integrity and demonstrating strong and consistent values. As a technology company, protecting the privacy and security of our customers’ data through rigorous policies, systems, and practices is essential. More broadly, we promote human rights across our value chain. To drive progress across industries, we promote public policies that align with our  
impact opportunity areas in an open manner.
Corporate governance
